item.title: Switched Hexo Theme to Apollo
item.description: I’ve been using the well-developed NexT theme for this Hexo blog since I built it. The old theme was fantastic, with a broad header, strong local search, neat, animated two-column layout and various comment systems including valine1 and gitment2. However, it’s a two-edged sword to have so many features binded, and more importantly, presented right within such a simple layout. Eventually, I realized that I actually don’t need the spacious header or the animated sidebar (I do, though, need local search, and we’ll return to that below).
